recipesJson.name: Hakuna Matata
recipesJson.author: Zupp6m6n
recipesJson.description:
Well balanced Banana, Papaya and Tangerine mix with a pinch of Dragonfruit in the mix.
Give atleast a night to sattle down or 3 days for edless orgasms.
Enjoy,
Peace V

reviews.text: It means no worries...for the rest of your bottle anyways. Delicious thank you Zupp6m6n. And seriously, listen to the 3 day minimum steep time it changes from great off the shake to amazing after 3-4 days. It's summer, just mix it already, you will thank the creator with 5 stars just as I have
Oh yes! A beautiful old fashioned fruit salad,  swimming in the papaya juices and dripping with taste.  Perfection. Thank you for the recipe.
